name: MyLens
title: My Warning Lens
description: This lens highlights sections related to my specific risk/safety, based on a patient's gender and age.
purpose: To improve patient safety and understanding of medicinal risks by emphasizing relevant text.
usage: This lens is intended for healthcare professionals and patients to enhance awareness of specific risks associated with medications based on demographic factors.
